DOC.brief_summary: Hypertensive haemodialysis patients are at high risk for cardiovascular events. This study was undertaken to ascertain whether the upstream of aliskirne, a direct renin inhibitor improves mortality and cardiovascular outcomes in these high-risk population.
DOC.brief_title: RAAS Inhibitor Drugs in Dialysis Patients
